mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memberno, id, passwd, email, name, nickname, birth, zipcode, address1, address2, pf_img, file1saved, thumb1, size1, mdate, grade) VALUES (member_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{passwd}, #{email}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{birth}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{pf_img}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate, #{grade})
mapper.select: SELECT memberno, id, passwd, email, name, nickname, birth, zipcode, address1, address2, pf_img, file1saved, thumb1, size1, mdate, grade FROM member ORDER BY grade ASC, id ASC
